item.title: Setting up docker buildx on Linux
item.description: Docker buildx on Linux # Installation instructions for Ubuntu To execute docker commands without sudo. We need to add the username to the docker group. Find the current username by typing who Add username to docker group Reboot system $ who vikaspogu :0 2020-12-05 10:10 (:0) $ sudo usermod -aG docker vikaspogu $ sudo reboot Enable buildx # Create a new config.json file under the ~.docker folder and enable the experimental feature

item.title: Raspberry Pi garage opener on k3s cluster
item.description: Many articles are out there which demonstrate how to use a raspberry pi as a DIY garage door opener project. Few are outdated and not deployed using container images. I found a few reasonable solutions on google, but I couldn’t run them on the Kubernetes cluster due to older packages or insufficient information. I decided to build my solution from different sources of information I found What we’ll cover in this post
